Ancient + Brave is a British wellness and nutrition company that produces collagen and functional food supplements. Founded by Kate Prince, the company has appeared in rankings of the United Kingdom’s fastest-growing private businesses.
History
Ancient + Brave was founded in 2018 by Kate Prince, a former media lawyer, following her interest in creating ethically sourced supplements.
The business initially operated from Uckfield, East Sussex, before relocating its headquarters to Lewes, East Sussex, in 2025.
Products
Ancient + Brave manufactures collagen powders and nutritional supplements, including True Collagen (a hydrolysed bovine collagen powder), creatine, mushroom tinctures, MCT oil, omega oils, magnesium, and ashwagandha.
Ethics and Charity
Ancient + Brave has been a Certified B Corporation since 2021 and is a member of 1% for the Planet. The company supports environmental and social projects through partnerships with Rainforest Concern, the Lotus Flower Project, and the Love Mercy Foundation, which funds a midwifery and healthcare facility in Otuke, Uganda.
Funding and Growth
In 2023, the company raised £7 million in investment from private-equity firm Piper. Ancient + Brave was listed fifth in The Sunday Times 100 ranking of the UK's fastest-growing private companies in 2024, and eleventh in 2025. The company also appeared on the Financial Times Europe’s Fastest Growing Companies 2025 list, ranking 77th overall.
By 2025, the company had launched in Germany, Spain, and the United States.
